trigger.Name: GlobalVar
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trRemoveWeapon
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local playa = GetPlayerVehicle() if playa then playa:SetPosition(StringToCVector(GetVar("BonusWeaponRemoveSavedPos").AsString)) end

trigger.Name: RestoreTolerance
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() RestoreAllToleranceStatus()

trigger.Name: trStartMap
trigger.script:
RuleConsole("currentRadarScanRadius 100")
local waterfall = getObj("waterfall_00") if waterfall then waterfall:SetNodeAction( AT_MOVE1 ) end
TActivate( "trStartQuest" ) trigger:Deactivate()
local tables = {{13811, 13970}} ShroomCalc(tables) SetVar("ShroomCalcParam", "{4800, 30, 120000}") -- minReward, maxReward, maxBonus, reachable SetVar("Checkpoints", 0)

trigger.Name: trGameSart
trigger.script:
function SaveGame( name ) rockFall = rockFall or {} local str = "Nav = " .. serialize ( Nav ) .. "; " local str = str .. "Ambushs = " .. serialize ( Ambushs ) .. "; " local str = str .. "rockFall = " .. serialize ( rockFall ) .. "; "
--dostring( "a = serialize ( Nav )") SetVar( "SavedTables", str ) SavesManager:SaveCheckpoint( name ) end
function LoadingGame() local str = GetVar( "SavedTables" ).AsString dostring( str ) end
local loaded = GetVar( "loaded" ).AsInt OnAnyRestart() if ( loaded == -1 ) or ( loadedStatus == "firstLoad" ) then loadedStatus = "Loaded" SetVar( "loaded", 1 ) LOG("TRIGGERS: SEE - GAME STARTED SUSSFULLLL") TActivate("trStartMap") TActivate("trAmbInit") TActivate("trNavInit") TActivate("trRockFallInit") TActivate("trRadiationInit") -- TActivate("trBurnInit") -- TActivate("trStormInit") -- TActivate("trTimersInit") TActivate("trJumpCamInit") else LoadingGame() LOG("SEE - GAME LOADED SUSSFULLLL") end

trigger.Name: trAmbInit
trAmbStart
trigger.script:
local loc = trigger:GetCallObjName() trigger:DelEventObj( "GE_OBJECT_ENTERS_LOCATION", loc )
local amb = nil for i,v in Ambushs do if v.onEnter == loc then amb = v break end end
local belong = amb.belong or (1110 + math.random(4))
CreateTeam( "ambTeam_"..amb.onEnter , belong, getPos( amb.onSpawn ), amb.spawnTeam, getPos( loc ))

trigger.Name: trNavInit
trNavWork
trigger.script: CompasWork( trigger )

trigger.Name: NavDraw
trigger.script: CompasShow( trigger )

trigger.Name: trRockFallInit
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
rockFall = {} local base = "RockFall_" local start = 902 local end_l = 915
local tr_Start = getObj("trRockFallStart") local tr_End = getObj("trRockFallEnd")
for i = start, end_l do tr_Start:AddEvent ( "GE_OBJECT_ENTERS_LOCATION", base .. tostring( i ) ) -- tr_End:AddEvent ( "GE_OBJECT_LEAVES_LOCATION", base .. tostring( i ) ) end;
tr_Start:Activate() -- tr_End:Activate() TActivate("trRockFallTTL")

trigger.Name: trRockFallStart
trRockFallEnd
trigger.script: SetVar( "PlayersRadioactiveZones", GetVar("PlayersRadioactiveZones").AsInt - 1 )

trigger.Name: trRockFallTTL
trigger.script: for i, v in rockFall do v.ttl = v.ttl - 3 if 0 >= v.ttl then SafeRemove( v.stone ) table.remove( rockFall, i ) end end

trigger.Name: trBonusText_00
trigger.script: TakeQuest( "ng1_dv5_t0" ) CompleteQuest( "ng1_dv5_t0" ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trBonusText_01
trigger.script: TakeQuest( "ng1_dv5_t1" ) CompleteQuest( "ng1_dv5_t1" ) trigger:Deactivate()

trigger.Name: trStartQuest
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() TakeQuest( "ng1_dv5_q1" ) CompasOn( 30, 2 ) FlyShort ( { time = 6 , msg = { 5001, 50011, 1, 2, 3, 4 }} )

trigger.Name: trQ1_2Init
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() FlyShort ( { time = 11 , msg = { 5002, 5003, 5004, 50041 }, CompQuest1 ="ng1_dv5_q1" } ) -- CompleteQuest( "dv5_q1" ) TakeQuest( "ng1_dv5_q1_2" ) -- CompasOff()

trigger.Name: trQ1_2Init
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() FlyShort ( { time = 6 , msg = { 5009, 50091, 50092 }} ) TakeQuest( "ng1_dv5_q2" )

trigger.Name: trEgg
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() FlyShort ( { time = 11 , msg = { 5011, 5012 }, CompQuest1 ="ng1_dv5_q2" } ) --CompleteQuest( "dv5_q2" ) TakeQuest( "ng1_dv5_q1_2" )

trigger.Name: trSave1
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() SetVar("Checkpoints", (GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt + 1)) SaveGame( "ng1_dv5_AfterFall" )

trigger.Name: trSave2
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() SetVar("Checkpoints", (GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt + 1)) SaveGame( "ng1_dv5_DarkSwamp" )

trigger.Name: trSave3
trigger.script: trigger:Deactivate() SetVar("Checkpoints", (GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt + 1)) SaveGame( "ng1_dv5_Valley" )

trigger.Name: trWin1
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate() if 2>=GetVar("Checkpoints").AsInt then SpawnMessageBox( "369" ) local playa = GetPlayerVehicle() if playa then playa:AddModifier("hp", "- 1337") end else local shroomCalcParam = StringToTable(GetVar("ShroomCalcParam").AsString) ShroomRewardGive(shroomCalcParam[1], shroomCalcParam[2], shroomCalcParam[3])
-- CompleteQuest( "dv5_q1_2" ) FlyShort ( { time = 65 , msg = { 5007, 5008, 5010, 50103, 50104, 11, 50102, 12, 13, 14, 50101, 15 },CompQuest1 ="ng1_dv5_q1_2", removeWeapon = 1} ) TActivate("trWin2") -- CompasOff() end

trigger.Name: trWin2
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
loadedStatus = "firstLoad" Intermission:Show("ng1_dv6", "locStart", 165)

trigger.Name: trShroomNote1
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
AddImportantFadingMsgId("fm_player_notification_received") AddFadingMsgId("fm_player_shroom_bonus_notification")

trigger.Name: trShroomNote2
trigger.script:
trigger:Deactivate()
local shroomCalcParam = StringToTable(GetVar("ShroomCalcParam").AsString) AddImportantFadingMsgId("fm_player_notification_received") AddFadingMsgByStrIdFormatted("fm_player_shroom_bonus_complete", ShroomRewardCalc(shroomCalcParam[1], shroomCalcParam[2], shroomCalcParam[3]))
